casebody.data:
No. 186,

Misc.

Aberlin v. Sugarman, U. S. District Judge, et al. Dora Aberlin for petitioner. Louis J. Lejkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, and Dunton F. Tynan, Assistant Attorney General, for Hill et al., and Peter Campbell Brown, pro se, Seymour B. Quel and Anthony Curreri for the Corporation Counsel of New York City, respondents.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied.
